name: Merged.io
description:
Check out Merged.io, the newest hit game from New Leaf Studios!

The concept is simple, combine cubes to become merged! Make a long chain of cubes, or merge cubes together to make a high score!

Whether you’re bold or careful, outwit your opponents by finding the best strategy to become the largest. Stay cautious, you have a weak point : your head. If it is ever touched by an opponent, you are dead.

Here are the features that Merged.io captivates .io game fans with:
Online Action
New .io online game
Merged in a new style game

After the success of Light-Bikes.io, New Leaf offers a new and fun experience inspired by io type games (popularized by games such as slither.io). Find the simplicity and strategy on an io game within a unique io puzzle universe.

Merged.io will be your new .io addiction so follow our social accounts to stay updated and receive the latest improvement news:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NewLeafStudios
Twitter: @newleafstudios

We’d love to hear from you so leave a review and tell us what we can do to make this the best online .io game!
